title: Old-Fashioned Pancakes
instructions: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In a separate bowl, beat the egg and then stir in the milk and melted butter. Make sure the milk is warm! Otherwise the butter will curdle.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
Cook in a ceramic non-stick pan, with no oil/spray, set over medium/medium-low heat. About 400 degrees F works.
Add some water to the batter if it thickens after standing.
